104663f6-7d05-41c5-bfaf-624f707e4ecd.name: Lead SME SysOps Administrator - Associate

issuer.summary: issued by Amazon Web Services Training and Certification

entity.name: Amazon Web Services Training and Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Has attended and actively participated in at least two (2) AWS Certification SysOps Administrator- Associate providing technical review, actively written items in at least one (1) development event and successfully completed and passed the CLSME training.
